text: Edith Bonlieu (18 September 1934 - 22 December 1995) was a French alpine skier. She competed in the women's downhill at the 1956 Winter Olympics. She was a member of the Order of the Solar Temple and took her own life in a mass suicide with other cult members. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:1995 deaths Category:French female alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of France Category:Alpine skiers at the 1956 Winter Olympics Category:Order of the Solar Temple Category:Suicides in France Category:Sportspeople from Yonne
title: Edith Bonlieu
